forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 15C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 10C. S winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. S winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. SSE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. SSE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine in the morning giving way to clouds and a few showers during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
